restaurants.name: Ink & Ember Kitchen
restaurants.notes: Cozy, book-lined walls and a quiet dining room popular with teachers and grad students; extensive vegetarian small plates and mains.

restaurants.name: The Quiet Leaf Bistro
restaurants.notes: All-vegetarian menu with many vegan options; soft lighting and low background music, good for reflective conversations.

restaurants.name: Marginalia Wine & Fare
restaurants.notes: Small plates, mezze, and a strong vegetarian selection; tends to be calm before 20:00, with a few communal tables suited to academic meetups.

restaurants.name: Stanza Noodle & Tea House
restaurants.notes: Casual but generally quiet early in the evening; several tofu and vegetable-focused dishes, with large tables for small groups.
